body.name: GOTHAM STEEL Hammered 9.5 Inch Non Stick Frying Pans with Lid, Frying Pans Nonstick with Lid, Healthy and Non Toxic Ceramic Pan for Cooking, Nonstick Frying Pan, Induction Dishwasher Safe – Copper
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Sunday, February 18 on orders shipped by Amazon over $35
Or fastest delivery Thursday, February 15. Order within 5 hrs 16 mins
features: ELEGANT YET PRACTICAL – The Gotham Steel hammered collection is beautiful and makes a statement in every kitchen, yet nonstick, lightweight, scratch resistant and dishwasher safe!
NON-TOXIC COATING: All pots and pans made without PFOA, PFOS, PFAS, PFTE, lead, or cadmium, so they’re safer for you and your family.

ULTRA NONSTICK CERAMIC SURFACE: Healthy cooking is just a step away. Thanks to a nonstick surface that’s 2x more durable than previous generations, minimal to no oil or butter is needed. And they’re designed to properly conduct heat so food cooks evenly.

EASY TO CLEAN: No more stuck-on bits! Food slides right off when used on low and medium heat as directed. Wipe off with minimal scrubbing. The ceramic coating is stain resistant (and scratch resistant) so no need to worry about tomato sauce, beets, or any other food. Plus this set is designed to be dishwasher safe.
DISHWASHER SAFE: Spend less time on cleanup during busy weeknights. Once you’re done cooking, just place your cookware into the dishwasher for a hassle-free cleaning experience.

EASY TO HANDLE: Easy to lift and move around, from stovetop to oven to table, yet sturdy enough to handle all your cooking needs. Ergonomic handles stay cool to the touch to offer maximum comfort while cooking.

OVEN SAFE TO 500˚F: Go from stovetop to table with ease. All pieces are compatible with gas, electric, ceramic, and halogen stovetops. Plus, fry pans and saucepans are compatible with induction ovens, while stock pot is not.

GREAT GIFT: Give a practical and thoughtful present: college grads, a wedding shower, newlywed registry, housewarming for new renters and homeowners, or someone who really enjoys cooking with well-made cookware. Or stock a vacation rental with picture-worthy cookware.
10-YEAR GUARANTEE: Each pan comes with a limited guarantee for up to 10 years.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 12, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars A good looking frying pan..see how it last long term
reviews.reviewText: My 10" non stick pan (a name brand) is on it's last leg. It's not due to use using metal or abusing it but it's lost it's non stick. The company didn't want to warranty it so I was looking for a replacement.I found this as a replacement as I like the fact this is oven safe, PTFE free and ceramic coating, which i feel is safer and healthier. It's a good looking pan and so far not bad. I like that you don't have to use oil or butter. I am a bit leary of non stick as I have gone through several non stick and they all wore out. This one has a 10 yr warranty so hopefully they are still around.I didn't give it five stars because long term don't know how this will hold up and wished this was 10" instead of 9.5" but for now it's a four star. I believe this is a good option for anyone looking for a non stick.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 11, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Light yet Sturdy
reviews.reviewText: What a great mid-sized frying pan. Perfect for a single person making themselves some breakfast. This thing is also oven safe up to 500 degrees. Has a stay cool handle and looks very good compared to my old and tired frying pans. Definitely a satisfied customer.
